metadata.creator: Miguel Cornejo
metadata.description: This document contains the pre-war encyclopedic directory of the Philippines. Formerly known as Cornejoâ€™s Philippine Directory. Also, it contains a historical account of the Philippines from pre-Spanish period; state documents, inaugural addresses and speeches of American and Filipino statesmen; and opinion and press statements of military and naval authorities, politicians, economists, educators, and writers on Philippine affairs, among others.
